episodes.title: Ep. 06: Why I Am No Longer A Jehovah's Witness
episodes.description:
I have explained my stance about why I chose to NOT be a Jehovah's Witness any longer. In this episode I go a little deeper as to why. Hopefully I can wake a few more JW's up so they flee that cult!
Support the show

episodes.title: Ep. 05: Watchtower Bible & Tract Society - Big Business
episodes.description:
The Jehovah's Witness old brand is what I called a religion wrapped around a publishing company. Tracts, brochures, magazines, books, and bound volumes. The flock needed spiritual food, and this publishing giant wanted to provide it, for a fee!
Support the show

episodes.title: Jehovah’s Witnesses and Women - part 3
episodes.description: So this is continuation on my thoughts of how women are treated in the Jehovah’s Witness culture. I swear, the only reason some of those loser a$$ men in that cult were married was because they were in that cult. Women in every day life probably wouldn't have given them the time of day! #exjw #exjehovahswitness #excultmember #sexism #jwsisters #jworg #jw

episodes.title: Ep. 03: The Main Reason I Left the Jehovah's Witness Cult
episodes.description: I have numerous reasons I have that I stopped being a Jehovah’s Witness. I have videos on TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram listing them. However, the main, absolute, number one reason: the organization-wide cover-up of CSA within the Jehovah’s Witness organization, worldwide. Truly sickening and horrendous. Please listen, like, and SHARE this important episode. Thank you very much! - Mitch

episodes.title: Ep. 02: My Family Life
episodes.description: Many of us as kids growing up as a Jehovah’s Witness may have felt pressure, or coercion to get baptized. I didn't necessarily feel that way, and in this episode will share a little insight as to how it was that I grew up being a witness kid, and elder's son. #exjw #exjehovahswitness #jw #jworg #excultmember

episodes.title: Ep. 01: An Introduction to Mitch
episodes.description: In this episode, I introduce myself and give you insight into my life growing up as a Jehovah’s Witness. I also give you preliminary thoughts as to why I wanted to break away from that religion/cult.

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses - A Corrupt Organization
episodes.description:
Hello, my name is Mitch, and I was in the religious cult known as Jehovah's Witnesses for over 50 years. I decided to break ties with them all together in January 2025. Although it may hurt family and friends still in that organization, I have to stay true to myself. My number ONE reason for leaving is the organization's choice to hide and protect accused sexual predators within their organization in congregations around the world, not alerting the proper authorities on who they are, or what they have done. Instead, victims are shamed and silenced.

I ask you to consider facts, and decide for yourself. My mission is to expose the false prophets at the world headquarters in New York, USA. The more people that are made aware of these horrible actions taking place, the sooner we can bring justice to the deserving victims. Thank you very much.
#exjw #exjehovahswitness #excult #exjwsupport #jw #jworg #jehovahwitness #jehovah #excultmember #jwglobal #jwgoverningbody #jwelders #jwcorruption #jwscandal

episodes.title: The Issues I Have with Jehovah’s Witnesses Elders - What Triggered Me to Leave Once and for All!
episodes.description: I always had questions about the organization. I have NO issue with God or Bible doctrine!!!! My beef is with the corrupt governing body and organization. I go by facts, especially court cases with real names, and real cover-ups exposed. Use your mind and see the REAL truth! #exjw  #exjwsupport #jw #exjehovahswitness #jworg #cult #jwbrotherhood #jwcult #excult #exjehovahswitnesssupport #jwelders #jwcoverups #jehovahwitness #jehovah

episodes.title: The Main Reason I No Longer Wanted to be A Jehovah’s Witness!
episodes.description: My reasons are based on facts. Verifiable facts! So please, no current JW cult members popping up on here talking wicked & tough. Do your due diligence! #excult #exjwsupport #exjw #exjwsupport #jw #exjehovahswitness #exjw #jworg
